wikipedia_page.main: Sir Charles James Watkin Williams (23 September 1828 – 17 July 1884) was a Welsh judge, doctor and Liberal politician who sat in the House of Commons from 1868 to 1880.

response: * Watkin Williams (Liberal politician) (Charles James Watkin Williams, 1828–1884), British Member of Parliament for Caernarvonshire, 1880
